website_summaries.verdict: Relatively pricey, but if taste is a big factor for you, it's a good investment.
pros: Great taste, no added amino acids or fillers, and a great combination of ingredients
cons: Comparable in price with similar products until you realize how much you have to use

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as you would get at GNC even though advertised the same.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this same flavor at GNC then saw it go on sale here so I purchased a 4lb of the same flavor and it is not the same, smell, taste & label are different. Disappointed. Something is off.....label looked slapped on and taste is way off
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warning of ingredient that can cause cancer or reproductive issues.
customer_reviews.text: I have been having rrouble sleeping lately so naturally I started takings tally of any recent changes including my supplements. I went to check to see if by chance I overlooked this product may have caffeine or anything and while it doesnt. I did come across and warning sign that had been previously overlooked that says the state of California recognizes an ingredient in it that can cause CANCER OR REPRODUCTIVE ISSUES. First off wtf?! This should be in bold and clearly known to the consumer prior to purchase. I am not one on those fools who will shove just whatever in my body for "gains". I am very disappointed and dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Flavor is very good
customer_reviews.text: Basically a mix of milk proteins,whey and casein, (in non milk proportions) with a small amount of egg protein. So it should be roughly~ 12.5g casein, 10g whey and 2.5g egg protein. For the price it makes more sense to me to just mix some whey and egg proteins in milk (or with casein) . Otherwise seems like a decent protein blend to split its effects over hours, though I'd have liked a bit more egg protein instead of adding it myself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed with flavor or texture
customer_reviews.text: I am new to the protein world, but I've been drinking premade protein shakes for a couple years. I put one scoop of the chocolate mousse in cold water in a lidded nottle and shook the crud out of it. It dissolved correctly and even thickened slightly. I was unimpressed with the flavor and even less so with the texture. The can says milk or water, but low carb means I can't do the milk. Suggested to use ice in blender for a smoothie like drink. Still unsure. It would have been nice to have offered a smaller sample variety pack with maybe 3-4 scoops. I will try it as a smoothie but really takes away from the convenience factor.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Dr jim
customer_reviews.text: Dr jim got people brain wash who takes his supplements. his protein is just protein yeah i tried it all the flavors the root beer ,smores , vanilla its just protein which has whey ,casein in it ,egg protein. there other proteins out there got that too . this other supplements don't work jym shred sure don't your just paying out your money for that and no results. yeah your thinking dr jim is a buff dude . yeah he spends his time mostly at the gym and probably steroids . i hate spending my money on stuff and it not working and it makes you sick
customer_reviews.author: Randy page

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Protein
customer_reviews.text: This is a great protein powder. The Jym supplement line is fantastic and I like most flavors. This protein, in particular, is a little unique in that it has tiny marshmallows! However, I like to mix my protein with unsweetened vanilla almond milk and Starbucks dark roast iced coffee and let it sit in the fridge for a few hours. That dissolves the marshmallows and makes for a nice, smooth and thick protein shake. It's delish!
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: The gold standard, great blended protein, BEST DAMN TASTING PROTEIN EVER!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: There is no doubt pro jym make amazing products.... this protein is the very burst money can buy! It tastes sooooo good! Like I can’t explain how delicious this is! The chocolate chip cookie crunch is amazing! I have given all my friends scoops and they all went and bought it! It is low carb and sugar! Just a great product!
customer_reviews.author: swampdonkey

customer_reviews.title: Delicious Protein Powder
customer_reviews.text: By far the best tasting protein powder. I purchased the s’mores flavor on a recommendation from a friend. It is really good! I mix it before I workout and then it thickens while I exercise. When I’m done it’s perfect. Tastes like chocolate milk and I mix with water. About 8 oz so it’s thicker. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle E

customer_reviews.title: Best Protein Powder
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many brands of protein powder, and this is the best by far. The taste of this protein is far superior. I've bought chocolate mousse, caramel macchiato, and s'mores, and every single flavor was delicious. Unlike other brands, they don't clump. Honestly, I could eat a whole case of protein powder by itself.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Tastes amazing, quality ingredients
customer_reviews.text: I've always been a big fan of the Jym line of supplements. The ProJym is a staple for me after working out. The vanilla bean is the best flavor IMO. I blend a scoop of this with milk and frozen bananas for the perfect post workout shake
customer_reviews.author: Devan

customer_reviews.title: I keep coming back
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd time in a row getting this protein and I love it. I've got the chocolate mousse, vanilla bean, and cookies and cream. I love them all. Any of these taste great with just water, so much flavor. My from protein by far.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Son uses this and won't use any other since finding this one.
customer_reviews.text: My 29 yr old son swears by this protein powder, although it's expensive, when he's really working out. We go thru tubs of it and its not cheap, but better price here than from GNC.
customer_reviews.author: debbie meyer

customer_reviews.title: Taste good. Lower in protein then what the label claims. Expensive
customer_reviews.text: Taste: I like the flavor of almost every one of these. The cookies and cream isn’t good. Ingredients: they could be better. The taste makes up for the lacking Ingredients. The proteins ratio are OK. I’d like a more balanced egg protein. The dietary creamer, which makes it think and Taste good, I don’t necessarily like, but it gives the drink good flavor. There are more carbs and less protein then what the label claims. It’s not a deal breaker though. Price: from a protein prospective it’s expensive for what it is. Its pricey. The taste makes up for a lot.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: 20lbs of Muscle in 2 months
customer_reviews.text: This protein is unlike any other protein you will see on the market. The blend of 4 different types of protein helps you gain muscle when you are consistently in the gym. I am already about half way through my second order and will be ordering more of this in about 2 weeks. If you take this once a day it will last you about 45-60 days. Highly recommend this if you are looking for that extra edge to help with your Muscle gains in the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS! The powder is super fine so it blends easily and the chocolate mousse flavor is seriously perfect for me since it isn’t too sweet and yet not grossly chalky or anything. I highly recommend this over any other protein powder I’ve tried. I don’t think I’ll be looking for anything else now, this is perfect and it’s helping me reach my physical fitness goals too.
customer_reviews.author: Oopsiemommy

customer_reviews.title: Pro Jym is not only he best tasting protein powder but is also backed by science
customer_reviews.text: Pro Jym is not only he best tasting protein powder but is also backed by science. You want to have a blended protein not only after working out but also through the day. The staggered release will keep you going not only after your workout but for hours to come! All JYM Supplements are without the best on the market and I highly suggest you pick yourself up the JYM System (Pre, Post and Pro) and start making some serious gainzs!
customer_reviews.author: biggsmikes

customer_reviews.title: Unique, great tasting protein powder
customer_reviews.text: Really like this flavor (Caramel Macchiato) and the Jym line in general. It's pretty solid and comes in really nice, unique dessert flavors. Great for mixing up your protein shake routine. It's rarely on sale/deal, so just be prepared to pay a premium to other powders, but I think its worth it for the high quality flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua R

customer_reviews.title: My husband and I love this protein powder
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love this protein powder, it's a good mix for both of us - he works out and builds muscle and I just try to stay lean and have good protein in the am with my smoothies. It doesn't leave any funky taste, not chalky and mixes well. We've had the vanilla and chocolate, both delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia M

customer_reviews.title: Great overall with water
customer_reviews.text: This is the best blending protein I've had with water. Chocolate mousee has been my favorite out of the two other I've tried (red velvet and mint chocolate chip). I would add that the mint chocolate chip has small bits mixed into impersonate chocolate chips that made my shaker bottle hard to clean and times, so I would steer clear. Overall, good deal for price.
customer_reviews.author: M.C.

customer_reviews.title: Super Tasty!
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite protein shakes! The stack is more for someone putting on weight but I use this as a meal replacement along with a solid to feel full. It’s also got a good texture and is creamy. It tastes good enough to be mixed with water only.
customer_reviews.author: Kolby N.

customer_reviews.title: Mixes very smooth!
customer_reviews.text: Great protein powder that mixers real nice and easily even with water and a plain shaker cup. Be careful because the powder is very fine and easy to make a mess with but great tasting product!
customer_reviews.author: David Breaux

customer_reviews.title: I loved the fact that this protein didn’t upset my stomach-that’s ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved the fact that this protein didn’t upset my stomach-that’s ultimately why I purchased it. The flavor was good-not chalky at all. I purchased the Chocolate Mousse and when I mixed the powder with water it did get a fluffy film-mousse like-on too that was horrible. I had to skim off the top layer to get to the liquid. I would buy this again if it didn’t Produce that fluffy layer, the texture was just horrible. But it didn’t upset my stomach, so it’s a catch 22.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really good!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great! Doesn’t mix as well as most other brands I’ve tried (Ghost, ON, Cellucor, etc.) nut flavor is INCREDIBLE! and the texture is good too. Got the banana cream pie flavor and it’s really good mixed with 10oz of oat milk and a scoop of peanut butter for a quick breakfast. Probably my next go to powder to replace the ON I felt was lacking a lot. Big fan of the jym products at this point. Pre jym, alpha jym, and now this. Just got another tub!
customer_reviews.author: Reed

customer_reviews.title: Superb Quality Gainz
customer_reviews.text: Not only is ProJym the highest quality protein blend out there...it is the best tasting ever! The Tahitian Vanilla flavor is absolutely divine! I don't know how Dr.Stoppani did it, but it is the best tasting protein ever! The rocky road flavor is amazing! Like cheating and eating dessert! And for something that you have to drink everyday, multiple times per day, it is just awesome. It never gets old. It is also the most anabolic blend of premium protein available. Every sip is borderline orgasmic! Thank you JYM!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Vassiliadis

customer_reviews.title: Best one I've tried so far
customer_reviews.text: Very sweet...Definitely tastes like chocolate mousse...Best part - Doesn't clump up like other powders I've tried (I've tried 2 other brands)...I use this before my workout and I notice the extra boost while working out. I know it's not an energy mix, but I still feel more power when I use it before a workout.
customer_reviews.author: David P.

customer_reviews.title: Best Powder out there!
customer_reviews.text: Been taking powders for years.... but this has worked the best for me! Great flavor and good quantity! Great company.... Only thing that can improve is if the price was in the mid $40s instead of over $50
customer_reviews.author: LaertisGR

customer_reviews.title: Best protein powder I’ve ever had
customer_reviews.text: It’s so friggin good. Creamy and rich. I’ll never go back to another brand. I use a ninja blender and mix with ice, fruit, etc. But it even mixes well into oatmeal, water, or almond milk without a blender. With a cup ice cubes, 3/4C almond milk and 1.5 scoops of this protein powder blended you essentially get vanilla ice cream.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sucralose blast!
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed. Too much sucralose. Protein powder doesn't need to be that sweet. Expected more from Jim's protein blend. Don't believe the hype, check the ingredients before purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: ReviewShopper

customer_reviews.title: Great product but Caramel Macchiato is not a good flavor.
customer_reviews.text: I only use Jym products, will continue to use only Jym products... however this flavor is awful (caramel macchiato). Has a chemical smell and taste. I am throwing out the entire tub, I tried to ignore the taste... but it’s just to bad.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Aunthentic products.
customer_reviews.text: The product is awesome in terms of quality, taste, and the most important thing, it gives you the desired results, just as it says. Have tried different supplements but jym line products are unmatched, trully authentic, not using any other supplements apart from Jim Stoppani's. My body has transformed tremendously, getting compliments everywhere. Thank you so much Jim for your trully authentic products and transforming lives.
customer_reviews.author: Siprose

customer_reviews.title: JYM for the gym?
customer_reviews.text: Thought I'd try something different than my usual ON whey protein. Thought the combination of supplements would be an interesting take. I've been taking this post-workout for a month or so at this point. Can't say I've noticed anything too different than the Whey isolate alone; however, I know these things take time, so I'll probably leave another review later. Taste: 4/5 especially if you like vanilla, it is pretty much on point After-taste: 3/5 there's definitely a chalky after-taste that takes a bit more elbow-grease to get rid of in a blender bottle
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Should mix and taste better for the cost
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure the quality of the protein is great, and I'm a big fan of Jim Stoppani's programs and insight, but I would expect a protein supplement at this price point to mix and taste much better. Still a Stoppani supporter, just not a fan of the protein. That being said, others love the stuff and swear by it, so maybe I'm an exception. I would recommend finding someone that will share a scoop with you to try it out before purchasing - pretty different from the other protein brand I frequent.
customer_reviews.author: J. Monge

customer_reviews.title: Caramel Macchiato
customer_reviews.text: I was not too crazy with this flavor or the Mint Chocolate. However I do recommend the Chocolate Mousse or the Tahitian Vanilla Bean. They are not too sweet as the Caramel Macchiato or the Mint Chocolate.
customer_reviews.author: WENDY C ORELLANA

customer_reviews.title: Best protein ever
customer_reviews.text: #1 choice of protein for many. Not only because it was created by Jim Stoppani who knows what he is doing but because of results. Have been using this protein for a few years because of the mixture of different protein sources and wont stop anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny O

customer_reviews.title: Tasty and quality
customer_reviews.text: Mixes up light and fluffy in the blender, just like chocolate mousse. Great taste but subtle flavoring, but I can usually taste the almond milk if I use it instead of water. It's a bit pricey and I don't think I'd get this type again, there are other brands with better taste and macros.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal Supplement Line.
customer_reviews.text: By far one of my staples in Protein. Jym is an amazing product I would highly recommend to anyone. Even my grand babies like it. The Vanilla and S’more are my must have.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: THIS LAST BATCH IS OFF - WHERES'S THE CASEIN?
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this exact product for 2 years and this last batch is off. It tastes like it is missing the casein P. After 1 1/2 scoops is still very runny with 1 cup of water.......had to add my own casein to make it like what I am used to drinking. I am very familiar with the taste and thickness of casein protein and tell it's not in there.
customer_reviews.author: WalterEgo

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Very tasty and if you use the right blender it does not clump. I have forgotten my shaker ball a few times, and I didn't have too much of a problem with clumps still.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great Protein. Delicious
customer_reviews.text: Im a big fan of JYM Supplement products and have used several. This protein has to be one of my favorites. It tastes like a melted vanilla shake with milk and with water if you want to save calories and has a great blend to keep you going all day. I would highly recommend this and other JYM products
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy on the stomach
customer_reviews.text: My grandmother drinks this because her doctor said she needs more protein. She says this brand seems to upset her stomach much less than the others she has tried. She actually mixes it into oatmeal, and enjoys the combined flavour!
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: I used to like PRO JYM and used it past few years
customer_reviews.text: I used to like PRO JYM and used it past few years. But my recent tub was terrible, bad consistency, small dark particles in the powder and doesn't mix well. Not sure if there was change in manufacturing unit etc. I'm disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Helped with diet
customer_reviews.text: I appreciated the different types of Proteins. I believe it kept me satiated longer which helped with my diet. Chocolate mousse was awesome. I was also fond of the Banana cream pie except that after two weeks of using it I got tired of the flavor and still had half a tub left. I am also very happy with the Pre Jym products and flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Proctor

customer_reviews.title: Good protien powder, but no BCAA's
customer_reviews.text: Tastes good and mostly good ingredients. However, the powder iteself does not contain BCAA's like other similiarly priced protein powders.
customer_reviews.author: John ¥

customer_reviews.title: com along with the Jym Stacks supplements and really love their products
customer_reviews.text: I started using the "Shortcut to Size" App from BodyBuilding.com along with the Jym Stacks supplements and really love their products. They taste great, are healthy and have really helped me start building lean muscle !!
customer_reviews.author: Brad D

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Protein
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best proven protein shake on the market. Great amount for a great price. The only negative side is that the flavor isn't too appealing. Don't get me wrong, it's not bad, but drinking it by itself isnt great. Once I addedy favorite sides, it tasted amazing. So over-all it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Heylin Cardentey

customer_reviews.title: Hair in protein (Twice)
customer_reviews.text: Would haven give this 5 stars but there is long hair in this tub of protein. The first I thought maybe my friends hair got in my drink. The second time it happened my girlfriend found it, her hair is blonde the hairs in here are black. I’m not sure how the plant this game from operates but I would advise hair nets. I’ve never had anything like this happen before.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Magic elixir
customer_reviews.text: About to take this and get swoll. Just kidding, I’m a middle aged dude with a BMI of 41, which means I’m morbidly obese. Hopefully drinking this magical powder will mend the relationship with my estranged son.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: The absolute best tasting protein shake I have ever tried
customer_reviews.text: The absolute best tasting protein shake I have ever tried. Mixes great with water or milk with no clumping and chalkiness. The caramel macchiato and Tahitian vanilla bean flavors is uber tasty with iced black coffee. Also great for making protein pancakes or overnight oats. The Jym brand is one of the most honest brands in the industry with no proprietary blends, no fillers and no bs. What you see on the label is what you get, with pro jym you get blend of fast, moderate and slow digesting protein which helps muscle growth and recovery throughout the day.
customer_reviews.author: Sokha Keo

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great!
customer_reviews.text: This protein has given me some pretty good results. It tastes fantastic as well, I used to mix shakes with milk but water is fine for this. It does cause some pretty bad gas I’ve found, but that’s most protein powders.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan E.

customer_reviews.title: Very sweet, but Jym is great quality
customer_reviews.text: Way too sweet! Tastes like cake frosting. I cut it with plain whey and casin protiens I buy separately to make it taste right for me. Active ingredients are top notch, but artificial ingredients added are of some concern.
customer_reviews.author: DLWoregon

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting and effective protein
customer_reviews.text: I've been drinking ProJym for almost 3 years and is by far my favorite protein on the market. It's a high quality blend produced by a brand you can actually trust which is extremely important when it comes to supplements. Check out jymsupplementscience.com for more info if you're interested. My favorite flavors are Tahitian Vanilla Bean and Caramel Macchiato. The vanilla is probably the best vanilla I've ever had. Enjoy and happy gains to you all!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: This is the best tasting protein drink I've ever had
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: DEEEEELICIOUS
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best protein powders I have ever bought. It's not an artificial banana taste and has just the right sweetness.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Jim Stapponi will help you in building a new you!
customer_reviews.text: Been a fan of Jym supplements for yrs and it keeps getting better!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting protein flavor for JYM
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several of the JYM line protein flavors and I have to say that the Rocky road is easily the best tasting flavor out of all of them.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great taste!
customer_reviews.text: Taste great and effective when used as directed (but would recommend a touch more liquid ex: 14-16oz vs 12oz per scoop). Chocolate mousse tastes awesome with just water, or wonderfully rich with milk. Seriously one of the best tasting mixes I've had.
customer_reviews.author: J.S.

customer_reviews.title: is probably the best tasting protein I have drank
customer_reviews.text: I must say the Chocolate Mousse, for me, is probably the best tasting protein I have drank. It does not leave that residual chalk taste like others do. I just ordered the Vanilla, hope its a good. I am tempted to order the red velvet cake. That will be next.
customer_reviews.author: A-bomb

customer_reviews.title: The only protein worth buying!
customer_reviews.text: I have fallen in love with the JYM brand. Although slightly more expensive than other brands by a couple of $, it offers more than 3x the quality and flavor. Which makes it well worth it. Never taste gritty, and fully dissolves without the need for a shaker ball in the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: Watch all the stuff from Jim where he puts a lot of research into these products. You can't get a protein blend with this balance for the money anywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: RL

customer_reviews.title: Poor Delivery
customer_reviews.text: It is a Great product... But poor delivery.. They put very little effort to make sure that you get this ! Just said they were unable to deliver .. Ridiculous
customer_reviews.author: Scott Sizemore

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, mixes great, great flavor, doesn't have that shitty protein after taste. Very pleased, I ordered 2 more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SO good
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love Pro JYMproducts. They all taste super good and are not hard to drink down.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent protein! Great taste and easy to mix. The best part about it was noticing a difference in recovery. Also made protein pudding with almond milk and peanut butter. Next time I will try the chocolate flavor!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica P.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Ingredients not so great taste
customer_reviews.text: Overall this protein does its job but it's definitely not the best tasting.
customer_reviews.author: devan

customer_reviews.title: Marshmallows! Yum
customer_reviews.text: Taste great mixed in Greek yogurt. It also has marshmallows that taste great when using a shaker cup.
customer_reviews.author: Keeley

customer_reviews.title: Beware cheap artificial sweetners
customer_reviews.text: Flavor is great. I wish I could drink this every day in my coffee, but after looking over the ingredients I will not. There are several artificial sweetners that I choose to aviod. I will not be ordering again. Had a horrible after taste. I returned this product
customer_reviews.author: lauran wardrep

customer_reviews.title: It is OK..... Would rather ...
customer_reviews.text: It is OK..... Would rather have another flavor...But Amazon needs to add the new flavor... so I can try it...
customer_reviews.author: R. LEMAINE

customer_reviews.title: I loved the flavors back when pro gym first came out
customer_reviews.text: I loved the flavors back when pro gym first came out. I decided to try it again and got chocolate moose. I regret paying for it, the flavor is not as good as it use to be at all. I have no experience with other flavors. I do really appreaciate the combination of proteins. Very helpful in recovery.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Very good product! I've been using Jym Protein for almost ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good product! I've been using Jym Protein for almost a year now. So far no complaints and it tastes much better and it's not as thick than most of the other kinds I've tried in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Dareck

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great product from a reputable company. Only issue I have is the mixture is poor. Usually a few clumps do not dissolve or sticks to the shaker no matter how much you shake it. Other than that A+++ !! Great taste too ! The banana is awesome
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Protein
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been a longtime supporter of Jym Supplements! This is by far the best tasting protein I have ever had!!
customer_reviews.author: Richard G. Saunders 3

customer_reviews.title: My favorite Jym protein for real...
customer_reviews.text: So good! Anybody that gives this less than 4-5 stars is wrong.. easy as that.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Graham

customer_reviews.title: Cant go wrong with Jym
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this. Helps with sweet tooth and full of great ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: johnny valdes

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Flavors not bad! I add it to smoothies and my oatmeal to give it a really sweet flavor and get my protein in. I’ve been gaining muscle mass not sure if it’s because I’ve been going ham and the gym or this protein powder. Maybe both. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: marin

customer_reviews.title: Jym does it right... again
customer_reviews.text: Easy to mix and Rocky Road is the best flavored protein in the Jym brand. I’ve tried other proteins and this is the brand I keep coming back to.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Rivas

customer_reviews.title: Great powder and flavor
customer_reviews.text: This is a well blended protein powder. All of the ingredients are beneficial and the flavor is great
customer_reviews.author: TAB

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor, easy to mix, lots of protein
customer_reviews.text: The Jym Protein Powder tastes great, is filling, easy to mix and has a fantastic blend of proteins.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best protein on the market
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey but thats what happens when your getting the best of the best. Flavor is amazing almost feels like it should be bad for you. Ordering 4 pounds for my dad as i write this review.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: I’m pretty picky about supps and this is my fav. Wish I started using this sooner. Best flavor is Tahitian vanilla.
customer_reviews.author: rk

customer_reviews.title: JYM for the WIN!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many other protein powders and this is my favorite by far. I feel great when taking it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really good!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Its a little bit on the thickly side compared to other shakes and the scoop is also very large. I purchased the chocolate and yes it is very chocolatey!! The instructions tell you how much to take, before or after and as well as after waking up and before sleeping. So far, I have no cons for this product.
customer_reviews.author: palden

customer_reviews.title: Red velvet cake taste just like the cake
customer_reviews.text: Red velvet cake taste just like the cake. Goes good with frozen berries and almond milk for a shake. The chocolate mouse taste like any other chocolate protein powder.
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Bad taste could not drink
customer_reviews.text: Terrible taste. Could not drink. JYM has good products but this one should be discontinued. I would return it but it’s not worth my time and trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Johnson

customer_reviews.title: I love this. Because it has 4 different proteins I ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this. Because it has 4 different proteins I feel satisfied longer. I try not to drink it before meals because then I am not hungry. Get energy boost
customer_reviews.author: servant

customer_reviews.title: Jym protein rocks
customer_reviews.text: It's the best protein hands down. Flavor is so good
customer_reviews.author: Dusty

customer_reviews.title: Get swollen
customer_reviews.text: Great supplement, the only flaw is it doesn’t mix well with out getting another work out shaking to mix it. Add some peanut butter for an added power punch.
customer_reviews.author: Hands Free User

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I think it’s very high quality. I got one with so sort of marshmallows that just get stuck.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Bolton

customer_reviews.title: ... through the years but this is by far the best one. Dr
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used lots of Protein Powders through the years but this is by far the best one. Dr. Jim Stoppani never disappoints in his products. This has fast and slow digesting proteins which is perfect whenever you take it. Highly recommend this one. Dissolves easily in shaker bottle and Caramel Macchiato is delicious in milk.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Sulyi

customer_reviews.title: Mixes well, Great taste
customer_reviews.text: By far my favorite protein...in fact the only kind I will use. Mixes very well with pre and post workout.
customer_reviews.author: LionsCoach08

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great
customer_reviews.text: I mix this in with a smoothie and can’t even tell I added protein. Very smooth and subtle taste.
customer_reviews.author: Lu

customer_reviews.title: Really nasty stuff
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t mix well at all you will be drinking clumps of protein powder no matter how hard you try and mix it. Nasty flavor and bad for people with even semi GI issues.... this stuff actually made me vomit 🤮
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Fills you up, nice and light
customer_reviews.text: I used this for about a year now, it is nice and light and can be mixed with anything. It fills you up very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Palka

customer_reviews.title: Very sweet
customer_reviews.text: Too sweet. Who loves sweet - good, but who don't it will be hard to use even half scoop.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Will definitely try other flavors
customer_reviews.text: This is delicious! I’ve tried other brands and their vanilla was not as good as this one. Very smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany S

customer_reviews.title: Jym Time!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great taste and smooth to drink not gritty like other protein shakes.
customer_reviews.author: Zac T

customer_reviews.title: Weird smell
customer_reviews.text: Been using this brand for years, but recently I noticed a weird smell coming out of the tub after a couple months of purchase .. wondering whether or not to throw it out ....
customer_reviews.author: yamil

customer_reviews.title: Great idea with great taste!
customer_reviews.text: Taste great! I think the mix of whey and casein is a great idea. I use this as a pre and post workout shake, as well as a boost of protein throughout day if needed. A bit pricey, but well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Travis J.

customer_reviews.title: im so happy you help me with my problem too many thanks ...
customer_reviews.text: im so happy you help me with my problem too many thanks this product is one of the best protein in the world i always buy this monthly with other product of this mark Jym
customer_reviews.author: WeisterXD

customer_reviews.title: It’s delicious but...
customer_reviews.text: The product was 3/4ths full. The flavor is amazing and I truly love it. However it is very difficult to blend/mix without getting a chalky texture or a thick drink.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I trust Jym supplements
customer_reviews.text: Best protein powder on the market. No amino spiking. Ingredients plainly listed on the container. Great taste. Mixes easily with water or milk. A brand you can trust
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Pro JYM Protein Powder - Egg White, Milk, Whey Protein Isolates & Micellar Casein | JYM Supplement Science | S'Mores, 4 lb
product_meta.description: Size:4 Pound (Pack of 1)| Style:S'Mores24g of Pure, Quality Protein in Every Scoop with No Added Amino Acids or Filler Nutrients. A Pure Blend of High-Quality Proteins in Exact Amounts to Maximize Growth, Recovery, and Repair
feature_bullets: ISOLATE BLEND - Scientific studies have shown that a blend is considerably better for maximizing muscle-build than standard whey protein alone, this blend contains whey protein isolate, micellar casein, milk protein isolate, and egg white protein.

GREAT TASTE - No other protein powder surpasses the great taste, texture, and nutrition of Pro JYM. Simply mix with water, milk, almond milk or add other ingredients for a delicious high protein shake or smoothie. It also comes in chocolate and vanilla.

PERFECT RATIO - Pro JYM contains the clinically tested ideal ratio of the three optimum proteins for building muscle: 50% casein, 40% whey and 10% egg protein. For both men & women, this blend supports your natural strength, energy, endurance & recovery.

NO SPIKING - Pro JYM does not include cheap amino acids that can lead to protein spiking. Each serving contains 24 grams of whole proteins, it is optimal for lean muscle growth, as a higher percentage of calories are derived from the protein.

VERSATILE USE - The Pro powder is the best before & after workouts, in the morning, between meals and at night. The blend of fast, medium and slow digesting proteins elevates muscle protein synthesis for longer and supports rebuild.
